'''Special Magical Crystal Ore''' is a Quest Item obtained during the "[[By Thy Pale Beams I Solitary Rove]]" [[World Quest]] in the [[Lunar Realm]] Event.

==Trivia==
*Unlike regular ores, the item will automatically be added into the player's [[inventory]] upon destroying it.
